# Learn about API authentication here: /python/getting-started # Find your api_key here: /settings/api import plotly.plotly as py from plotly.graph_objs import * trace1 = Scatter( x=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5], y=[1.5, 1, 1.3, 0.7, 0.8, 0.9] ) trace2 = Bar( x=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5], y=[1, 0.5, 0.7, -1.2, 0.3, 0.4] ) data = Data([trace1, trace2]) plot_url = py.plot(data, filename='bar-line')
